title: House showing: 8/6/2022, Sat, and 8/7/2022, Sun, 3pm to 4:30pm.
posting_body: ['26223 Gamboa St, #4, Hayward, CA 94544', 'Monthly Rent: $2250 , water and garbage paid, free2 parking.', 'House showing: 8/6/2022, Sat, and 8/7/2022, Sun, 3pm to 4:30pm.', 'It will close at 4:30pm , please don’t be late.', '•\tLiving space: 850 sq ft +/−, 2 stories townhouse style apartment', '•\t2 bedrooms, and 1 bath, bright and sunny', '•\tGranite countertop, beautiful cabinets, range, refrigerator, disposal', '•\tTile on 1st floor, and new vinyl floor on 2nd floor', '•\tNewly renovated', '•\tRent includes 2 parking spaces, water and garbage collection.', '•\t2 sets of Coin-op laundry machines in laundry room', '•\tClose to Highway #880, #92, #238, and #580.', 'Close to bus and Bart stations', '•\tConvenient location for shopping', '•\tExcellent neighborhood.', 'Safe and Quiet', '•\tGood credit report including credit scores is required', '•\t2 recent paycheck stubs are required for every applicant', '•\tOne year minimum lease required.', 'Long term tenants are welcome.', '•\tOne month rent security deposit plus $500 cleaning deposit required', 'No pets.', 'No any kind smoking, Section 8, Ok', '•\tApplication will give to you on open house.', 'No charge for Application.', 'For more information, please call or text', 'show contact info', 'with your phone number']
